tool.name: Blast and get matched sequences
tool.command: blastn -task blastn -db $genome -query $input -outfmt "7 std qlen slen qseq sseq" -num_threads 3 -word_size $word_size -num_alignments 50 -evalue 1e-5 -out genome_blast.txt

param.name: word_size
param.label: Primer target sequence name(s) (Separated with commas)

param.name: genome
param.label: Transcript library to search
param.help: Default is wheat IWGSC v1.1 (gene names has 02G), where the gene names are different from v1.0 (gene name is 01G): TraesCS1B02G018700 vs. TraesCS1B01G018700

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
This is just a quick way to extract similar sequences for specific primer design.
------
For more information go to : https://github.com/pinbo/getprimer
